the OICW assault weapon form far cry or a .55 cal sniper
[/quote]lol you are so stupid you dont even know about that gun besides socom code 9 shit

You made a thread about zombies attacking us, and so far all you’ve managed to say to anyone is that they are stupid.

Then have an option for “other?”

Then stop bitching everytime someone posts something that is not on the poll.[/quote]only that one guy and ill do what ever i want to
